concept.title: Post Incident Review

audience.otherprops: safety officers, incident investigators, management, continuous improvement teams

othermeta.name: shortdesc
othermeta.content: Defines the process for reviewing incidents, performing root cause analysis and tracking corrective actions after working at heights events.

othermeta.name: taxonomy

othermeta.name: usecase
othermeta.content: structure post incident reviews and corrective action tracking

ol.li: After each Rescue, perform the analysis and prepare the Rescue Report as per EHS-02-004-F001 Working at Heights Rescue Procedure Report.

Rescue equipment that is damaged or loaded by a fall must be withdrawn from use unless a competent person (or manufacturer instructions indicate to remove from service) has given permission for further use.
Review and amend the rescue plan on a regular schedule, after relevant changes to the worksite, and after all rescues or related incidents.
Perform refresher training for a rescue procedure once a year.
